scenario_text.value:
(Oh, wow... The cherry blossoms are in
full bloom.)

(Everyone stops on the way to the landmark
to take in the flowers.)

Maaan, is this spring, or is this spring,
amirite?

Right... Maybe the abundance of nature here
brings out the beauty of these blossoms.
(The flowers sure are pretty...)
We should hurry on ahead.
Can we take a breather?
I’m glad we came here.
We should hurry on ahead.

This area is gorgeous, but we can’t just sit
around gawking. We better not fall behind.

Aww, what’s the rush? Nothing wrong with
stopping and smelling the...cherry blossoms.
Why don’t we stick around here?

It’s so pretty around here... Should we take
a breather?

You know that’s out of the question. Try to
take it all in as we walk.
Eh heh... I was just joking, anyway.
I’m glad we came here.

I’m glad we came on this camp. Makes me look
forward to the historic landmark ahead.

Indeed. I find myself brimming with a sort of
excitement.

Heheh, if you put it that way, it sounds like
we’ve got some fun ahead of us.

Oh? Looks like Saki and Ryo beat us to the
punch.
I guess they went on ahead of us.

(The guy shooting daggers at everyone is Ryo,
an older kid from another school.)

(The girl who’s all smiles there is Saki. Her
looks are famous in the grade below ours.)

(They must be here to enjoy the cherry
blossoms, too.)

(Then again... I could be wrong in
Ryo’s case.)

Woooow, look how beautiful it is!
The flowers are so pretty!
Hmph...

Ha ha, what kind of person gets all grumpy in
front of a bunch of blooming cherry blossoms?

And seriously... Gorgeous weather like this is
perfect for a field trip.
What does one have to do with the other?
(Ha ha... I thought as much.)

(We’re not in any real rush. Might as well
look around here some more.)
